x-Sampa for CLIPS

Consonants
x-Sampa Description Example English
p labial stop palla ball
b voiced labial stop bolla ball
t alveolar stop tana liar
d voiced alveolar stop dado dice
k velar stop cane dog
d voiced alveolar stop dado dice
g voiced velar stop gatto cat
ts alveolar affricate zio uncle
dz voiced alveolar affricate zolla clod
tS alveolar affricate cena dinnera
dZ voiced alveolar affricate giro turn
f labiodental fricative faro lighthouse
v voiced labiodental fricative vano vain
s alveolar fricative sale salt
z voiced alveolar fricative sbaglio mistake
S palatal fricative sciarpa scarf
m labial nasal mamma mommy
n alveolar nasal nonna grandmather
J palatal nasal gnomo gnome
r alveolar vibrant rana frog
l alveolar lateral lana wool
L palatal lateral paglia ball
j palatal glide ieri yesterday
w velar glide nuovo new

Vowels

x-Sampa Description Example English
i Front, close fino thin
e Front, close-mid pera pear
E Front, open-mid meta goal
a Front, open fata fairy
o Back, open-mid, rounded nota note
O Back, close-mid, rounded voto mark
u Back, close, rounded unico unic
